---
title: "Country Analysis: Japan"
format: html
---

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
country_df = df[df["country"] == "Japan"]

fig, axs = plt.subplots(3, 1, figsize=(8, 10))

axs[0].plot(country_df["year"], country_df["life_expectancy"], marker='o')
axs[0].set_title("Life Expectancy in Japan")

axs[1].plot(country_df["year"], country_df["gdp_per_capita"], marker='o')
axs[1].set_title("GDP per Capita in Japan")

axs[2].plot(country_df["year"], country_df["population_millions"], marker='o')
axs[2].set_title("Population in Japan (millions)")

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
